Blockbuster 1 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap an untapped non-Aura permanent you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell is a blockbuster, that creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn instead.
